name: magda-wal-g
description: Docker image extends the bitnami WAL-G Image and adds envdir utility.
author: Jacky Jiang <jacky.jiang@data61.csiro.au>

scripts.check-release-version: if [[ "$CI_COMMIT_TAG" == "v${npm_package_version}" ]]; then echo "Version check passed!"; else echo "Release tag $CI_COMMIT_TAG is not equal to package version v${npm_package_version}"; exit 1; fi
